properties.address: 1-3 Bitton Park Road,, Teignmouth, devon TQ14 9BT TQ14 9BT
properties.description: Come along to our community café here at the Alice Cross Centre every Thursday from 1.30pm - 4pm and Every Saturday 08.30 - 12pm Our café offers delicious home cooked, nutritious meals and light bites, snacks, cakes and hot drinks. Open to all! There is no need to book. Food is offered on a pay-what-you-can or donation basis.
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.description: Our Community Cafe provides a safe, warm and welcoming space Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays for all age groups. We provide low-cost and free meals for those in need, a Community Fridge and Baby Bank. We have support workers available in the mornings who can offer support and advice. We have on-site showers, laundry facilities and clothes to anyone who finds themselves homeless. On Tuesday mornings we run a Craft Room for anyone interested in learning or sharing craft skills in a friendly group environment. Term time on Thursday mornings we run a Parent Hub Cafe providing a welcoming and supportive space for parents and children. The Baby Bank and Community Fridge is available during these sessions.
properties.title: Community Hub

properties.description: COME AND HAVE A MEAL READ A PAPER IN A WARM SAFE PLACE

properties.address: St Margaret's Church, Topsham, Exeter EX3 0HL
properties.description: The space is open to all, with facilities to make hot drinks, have a biscuit and read a book. Children and young people are more than welcome too, with a guardian. There is lots and lots of neutral toys, activities and games to occupy them.
properties.title: St Margaret's Church

properties.address: The Old Gospel Hall, Exmouth, Devon EX8 2LT
properties.description: We are open to the whole community, drop in any time and stay for as long or short a time as you like. Hot drinks and biscuits are available throughout the afternoon. Toys are available for pre-schoolers and board games/cards/puzzles/chat (or simply sit and be) for adults.
properties.title: The Old Gospel Hall

properties.description: Wesley's is a community cafe open to all. As well as serving hot and cold drinks, delicious snacks and meals and homemade cakes and scones, we also run an activity programme, workshops and lunch clubs. Wesley's also hosts the Budleigh Communty Larder.
properties.title: Wesley's Community Cafe and Space
